column1: For  the  reasons  as  discussed  above,  I  am  of  the  view  that  this
conviction that can be allowed to stand.  Hence, I set aside the conviction and
the  sentence  imposed  on  the  appellant.  Accordingly,  allowing  the  appeal,  I
acquit the appellant from the charge she was convicted before the High Court.
